testcase.name: Добавление новой книги с английским названием
Добавление новой книги со всеми заполненными полями

testsuite.system-out:
Request method: POST Request URI: http://localhost:5000/api/books Proxy: Request params: Query params: Form params: Path params: Headers: Accept=*/* Content-Type=application/json Cookies: Multiparts: Body: { "author": null, "id": 0, "isElectronicBook": false, "name": "Теория всего", "year": 0 } 2023-03-22 13:01:05 [INFO ] helpers.RequestHelper:sendRequest:47 Response body: { "book": { "author": null, "id": 54, "isElectronicBook": false, "name": "Теория всего", "year": 0 } } Request method: POST Request URI: http://localhost:5000/api/books Proxy: Request params: Query params: Form params: Path params: Headers: Accept=*/* Content-Type=application/json Cookies: Multiparts: Body: { "author": null, "id": 0, "isElectronicBook": false, "name": "Теория всего", "year": 0 } 2023-03-22 13:01:05 [INFO ] helpers.RequestHelper:sendRequest:47 Response body: { "book": { "author": null, "id": 55, "isElectronicBook": false, "name": "Теория всего", "year": 0 } } Request method: POST Request URI: http://localhost:5000/api/books Proxy: Request params: Query params: Form params: Path params: Headers: Accept=*/* Content-Type=application/json Cookies: Multiparts: Body: { "author": null, "id": 0, "isElectronicBook": false, "name": "Random Book", "year": -1999 } 2023-03-22 13:01:05 [INFO ] helpers.RequestHelper:sendRequest:47 Response body: { "book": { "author": null, "id": 56, "isElectronicBook": false, "name": "Random Book", "year": -1999 } } Request method: POST Request URI: http://localhost:5000/api/books Proxy: Request params: Query params: Form params: Path params: Headers: Accept=*/* Content-Type=application/json Cookies: Multiparts: Body: 2023-03-22 13:01:06 [INFO ] helpers.RequestHelper:sendRequest:47 Response body: 400 Bad Request
